verses.verse: Bel <WH1078> boweth down <WH3766>, Nebo <WH5015> stoopeth <WH7164>; their idols <WH6091> are upon the beasts <WH2416>, and upon the cattle <WH929>: the things that ye carried <WH5385> about are made a load <WH6006>, a burden <WH4853> to the weary beast <WH5889>.
They stoop <WH7164>, they bow down <WH3766> together <WH3162>; they could <WH3201> not deliver <WH4422> the burden <WH4853>, but themselves <WH5315> are gone <WH1980> into captivity <WH7628>.

Hearken <WH8085> unto me <WH1004>, O house of Jacob <WH3290>, and all the remnant <WH7611> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, that have been borne <WH6006> by me from their birth <WH990>, that have been carried <WH5375> from the womb <WH7356>;
and even to old age <WH2209> I am he <WH7872>, and even to hoar hairs will I carry <WH5445> you <WH6213>; I have made, and I will bear <WH5375>; yea <WH5445>, I will carry, and will deliver <WH4422>.
To whom will ye like <WH1819> me <WH7737>, and make me equal, and compare <WH4911> me <WH1819>, that we may be like?

Such as lavish <WH2107> gold <WH2091> out of the bag <WH3599>, and weigh <WH8254> silver <WH3701> in the balance <WH7070>, they hire <WH7936> a goldsmith <WH6884>, and he maketh <WH6213> it a god <WH410>; they fall down <WH5456>, yea <WH7812>, they worship.

They bear <WH5375> it upon the shoulder <WH3802>, they carry <WH5445> it <WH3240>, and set it in its place, and it standeth <WH5975>, from its place <WH4725> shall it not remove <WH4185>: yea <WH6817>, one may cry unto it <WH6030>, yet can it not answer, nor save <WH3467> him out of his trouble <WH6869>.
Remember <WH2142> this <WH377>, and show yourselves men; bring it again <WH7725> to mind <WH3820>, O ye transgressors <WH6586>.
Remember <WH2142> the former things <WH7223> of old <WH5769>: for I am God <WH410>, and there is none else <WH430>; I am God, and there is none <WH657> like me <WH3644>;

declaring <WH5046> the end <WH319> from the beginning <WH7225>, and from ancient times <WH6924> things that are not yet done <WH6213>; saying <WH559>, My counsel <WH6098> shall stand <WH6965>, and I will do <WH6213> all my pleasure <WH2656>;

calling <WH7121> a ravenous bird <WH5861> from the east <WH4217>, the man <WH376> of my counsel <WH6098> from a far <WH4801> country <WH776>; yea <WH1696>, I have spoken, I will also bring <WH935> it to pass <WH3335>; I have purposed, I will also do it <WH6213>.
Hearken <WH8085> unto me <WH47>, ye stout-hearted, that are far from <WH7350> righteousness <WH6666>:

I bring near <WH7126> my righteousness <WH6666>, it shall not be far off <WH7368>, and my salvation <WH8668> shall not tarry <WH309>; and I will place <WH5414> salvation <WH8668> in Zion <WH6726> for Israel <WH3478> my glory <WH8597>.
